name: tsrpc-miniapp
description: TSRPC MiniApp Client (Wechat App, QQ App...)

scripts.test:install: cd test/server && npm i & cd ../miniapp && npm i & cd ../../
scripts.test: npm run test:install && cd test/server && START npm run dev && cd ../miniapp && npm run dev && echo "请使用开发者工具打开test/miniapp目录完成测试" && cd ../../
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:dts && cp package.json LICENSE README.md dist/
scripts.build:dts: rm -rf lib && npx tsc && npx api-extractor run --local --verbose && node scripts/postDts.js && rm -rf lib
scripts.build:doc: rm -rf docs/api && npx api-documenter markdown --input temp --output docs/api
